name: Zompi (Pre-Alpha)
description:
This is my current game project and i'm starting on this website.

The game isn't ready not even half of it.

I wanted to release the game on Steam, but i would need  100$ to get green light.

Someday it will happen. i hope so

And now about the game! The game is based on laboratory which job was to get humans back from hell. But it failed and instead it released many faceless weird creatures and they took the control of the laboratory. That is everything that i can tell from the story.

 In the game there is four different mods. Custom map, endless, story and jump practice.

In the game there is no other humans than you yet. The project is on very early stage so there is nothing too much in the game but i will keep updating it when i can.

W=forwards, S=backwards, A=left, D=right, SPACE=jump, E=interact, F=flashlight, R=reload, SHIFT=run faster
